column1: transcript
so like at the beginning of the movie
they're both having a so-so day
because for one of the girl really likes rain
and she's sad
because it stopped raining
because it's sunny
and the boy he doesn't like rain
he's sad
it was raining
whenever the girl went, she had good luck
but she considered it bad luck
because she doesn’t like all that stuff
however the man, like he had bad luck
and didn't like that
it was super windy
and his umbrella like broke
they bump into each other
and they go their separate ways
but the man falls into an ice cream cart
and they both end up falling in
and whenever the guy's in front
they have really bad luck
but whenever the girl's in front
they have good luck
so she would always be in front
and they would have been having very good luck
soon they're falling off the golden gate bridge
they're falling off
and they are almost onto the Golden Gate bridge
so they hold each other's hands
and all of a sudden they have like best luck
and at the end they got on top of the Golden Gate Bridge
and share a popsicle
